page.title: 12LIFE STYLES
page.content: I live in the Fox Inn, I am ten years old and my name is Terri. On Mondays to Saturdays we open at ll o'clock. We do not have many customers in the afternoon. The people who work for us in the afternoon are Kay and Trevor. We have got two kitchens; one is the pub's and the other is for our own use. In the lounge we have some plates on the wall for decoration and we also have a big picture of a hunt over the chimney breast. We sell snacks and a lot of meals. We sell lemonade and different cordials; we also sell beer wine and spirits. We have our own bedrooms. My Dad has the biggest bedroom, then I have the medium sized one and the little room is spare where my friend Emma sleeps the night or when my Nanna and Grandad sleep. We have a little bathroom. We have big outbuildings. We have got 2 horses.
